L

laplace(double, double, double, double) - Static method in class dsm.parameters.Weight
This method computes the Laplace weight of a (word, feature) pair based on the frequencies given as input parameters.
lb(double) - Static method in class dsm.util.MiscUtil
A function calculating the binary logarithm of a double.
liddell(double, double, double, double) - Static method in class dsm.parameters.Weight
This method computes the Liddell weight of a (word, feature) pair based on the frequencies given as input parameters.

logLFunctionInsideLogLikelihood(double, double, double) - Static method in class dsm.parameters.Weight
This is the logL function used inside the logLikelihood function as described in "Manning and Sch√ºtze, 2000, Foundations of Statistical Natural Language Processing, p. 173"
logLikelihood(double, double, double, double) - Static method in class dsm.parameters.Weight
This function computes the log likelihood ratio of a (word, feature) pair based on the frequencies given as input parameters.
